titles.innovationsNews: Here are the latest innovations in the field of IT
titles.stepsSection: How is learning? step by step)

dryTheory.title: Not a dry theory
dryTheory.text: Our curriculum is designed to provide practical, real-world knowledge that you can immediately apply to your projects and career

realTasks.title: Tasks from real life
realTasks.text: We do not create abstract tasks, but take concrete tasks that a developer faces when working with clients, and that await the programmer in the future

uptoUpdate.title: Always Up-to-Date
uptoUpdate.text: Our course content is continuously updated to ensure you stay ahead of the curve, with the latest industry trends and best practices

practicalVideo.title: Practical video examples
practicalVideo.text: You will have videos with practical tasks and explanations that you can complete on your own

stepByStep.title: Our courses are structured in stages
stepByStep.text: You will learn everything step by step topic by topic, in the process of learning new topics you will learn topics that you have already studied

familiarization.title: Familiarization with the Topic
familiarization.description: When starting a new topic, you should first familiarize yourself with the new material. This is to ensure that you understand why this topic is important and where to apply it.

videoExamples.title: Video Examples
videoExamples.description: After familiarizing yourself, you should watch visual examples that will help you better grasp the topic. However, it's even better if you not only watch them but also try to repeat the steps.

practice.title: Practice
practice.description: The main stage of learning is practice, and you will have plenty of opportunities for that, as you'll be provided with numerous practical tasks of varying difficulty.

nextTopics.title: Moving on to the Next Topics
nextTopics.description: Once you’ve completed all the tasks and feel confident that you fully understand the topic, it's time to move on to the next one. Good luck!

infos.durationDepends: The duration of the study depends on you

schedule.title: What is the study schedule?
schedule.text: The study schedule is completely flexible. You can study whenever you want at your own pace.

whenCourseStarts.title: When does the course start?
whenCourseStarts.text: The course starts whenever it's convenient for you and when you're ready to learn something new.

studyingFormat.title: What study formats do we offer?
studyingFormat.text: We offer two study formats. In the first format, you will have materials, video examples, and practical tasks. In the second format, you will also have the opportunity to ask additional questions.

twoFactorAuth.codeSentOnEmail: A verification code has been sent to your email address
twoFactorAuth.codeSentOnEmailProblem: Error sending verification code to email
twoFactorAuth.sendEmailLetterTitle: Send an email to your address and confirm it
